21050064.desc: A Rectifier born born from an aerial phenomenon. Capturing the essence of an alien star, its design is delicate and lightweight, yet it remains sturdy and adaptable.

21020023.desc: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Sword for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

21020044.desc: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' courage. "A thousand echoes carry the war's tale, as spirits unite in resounding gorges of valor.”

21020034.desc: An improved version of a mass-produced sword model developed in Huanglong. With its sleek blade and minimalist design, this sword is exclusively crafted for the skilled hands of seasoned warriors.

21050044.desc: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' vigilant protection of Jinzhou. "Cast your gaze towards the north, where the city's silhouette fades, its gates veiled by the tranquil rain."

21020012.desc: The birth of revolutionary tides. A sword designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21030015.desc: Grip the sleek frame and feel its cool surface as you aim down the sight. With a pull of the trigger, unleash a thick smoke barrage onto the battlefield with these powerful Pistols in your hands.

21040043.desc: The Gauntlets provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and are very popular among the explorer group.

21040013.desc: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, these gauntlets also commemorate the sacrifices of those brave souls.

21020053.desc: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone for the development of new weapons.

21010026.desc: Each swing of the blade reveals the flow of time and the change of the stars. The sword embodies all things, uniting them into one. Its gentle aura seems capable of dissolving the indestructible, whether it's millennia-old ice or the stagnation of time.

21040053.desc: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

21010084.desc: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This broadblade takes its name from the fate of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

21010044.desc: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' preparedness. "Autumn fades in endless nights, ready blades gleam with silent might."

21030074.desc: These Pistols are ceremonial weapons used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

21040024.desc: A descending adagio. These gauntlets pulsate with the power of surging waves, shattering anything in their path like a deadly hymn.

21040023.desc: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed these test Gauntlets for technical verification. Their main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

21030044.desc: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' dedication. "Let my body ablaze, flames dance to banish all evil's haze."

21050053.desc: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

21010023.desc: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Broadblade for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

21050012.desc: The origin of universal genesis. A Rectifier designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21040044.desc: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' comradeship. "Thin garments yield to icy moons, while armor withstands the chill of stars."

21050036.desc: An energy core that simulates the cycle of stellar evolution. Infinity originates from the singularity, scattering the stars it pulls in. However, echoes always return even in the silence of finality—greetings from the birth of new stars.

21030011.desc: These pistols are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21020016.desc: Forged from the very essence and feathers of a legendary bird, this weapon blazes with an intensity that bathes the world in its luminous glow. With each fiery surge, it consumes all in its path, leaving nothing but ashes in its wake.

21010024.desc: A descending adagio. This broadblade dominates the battlefield with the power of discordance. The curtain never falls on a masterpiece.

21020084.desc: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This sword takes its name from the heart of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

21050015.desc: Take hold of the frozen Rectifier, a powerful tool imbued with the energy of the celestial lake. Let it lead you to ultimate knowledge and vanquish all obstacles in your path.

21040034.desc: Huaxu Academy has independently improved and developed the first set of highly practical high-performance Gauntlets based on the previous source energy weapons, representing the care and warmth of the Academy, stable and lasting.

21010011.desc: This broadblade is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21010016.desc: The ancient mountain stands tall, its peak reaching towards the sky. A river flows for thousands of years, forming the blade of a powerful weapon. As it is unsheathed, a powerful dragon's roar echoes through the heavens and earth, causing the sea to churn. This awe-inspiring weapon strikes fear in all who witness its might.

21040064.desc: The Gauntlets born from the strange phenomenon in the sky. The blacksmith infused the feelings of witnessing the strange star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert a tremendous momentum while protecting the user.

21040012.desc: The dawn of enduring endeavor. A pair of gauntlets designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21020011.desc: This sword is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21020043.desc: The Sword provided by the Pioneer Association for the voyagers is bright in color, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the group of explorers.

21030064.desc: Pistols born from the strange phenomena in the sky. The forger infused the weapon with the feelings from witnessing the strange star, making it look hollow and light, yet extremely stable, with the power of thunder when it fires.

21050011.desc: This rectifier is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21030013.desc: May victory prevail the lasting night. This type of pistols not only carries the oath of protection but also contains the hope of rejuvenation.

21040074.desc: These Gauntlets are ceremonial weapons used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

21050034.desc: An improved version of a Rectifier prototype from Huanglong's next-gen weaponry project. This device is characterized by its powerful, purified output and sound that resonates with the decisively strong-willed.

21030023.desc: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed these test Pistols for technical verification. Their main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

21050026.desc: An artist's seal adorned with rimed sprouts. It is stamped on numerous paintings that capture mountains and ravines in expressive, mesmerizing strokes. The tender sprouts symbolize the perpetual blossoming of artistic marvels.

21020024.desc: An ascending crescendo. This enchanting sword effortlessly cuts through anything in its way, like a glorious prelude.

21040016.desc: Crafted with the lost art from the Court of Savantae, these gauntlets are solid and unbreakable, despite their lightweight materials. They are no tools of violence or aggression, but instruments for unraveling puzzles and pursuing the truth.

21010064.desc: The Broadblade born from the aerial phenomenon. The blacksmith incorporates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert the invincible gravity of the starfall.

21040084.desc: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. These gauntlets take their name from the tragic demise of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

21010074.desc: This Broadblade is a ceremonial weapon used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

21030012.desc: The inception of valiant venture. A pair of pistols designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21030084.desc: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. These pistols take their name from the incessant course of destruction of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

21010012.desc: The onset of pinnacle pursuit. A broadblade designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

21040015.desc: The Gauntlets pulsate with an uncontrollable force, emanating unspeakable anger from the depths of the unknown lake. As you don them, unleash your fury on helpless enemies. Feel its power surge through you.

21050013.desc: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this rectifier signifies the confidence of those fighting souls.

21010034.desc: An improved version of a mass-produced broadblade model developed in Huanglong. With its formidable performance and innovative technologies, this broadblade carries a weight only to be wielded by seasoned warriors.

21050084.desc: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This rectifier takes its name from the devastating might of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

21050023.desc: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Rectifier for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

21040011.desc: These gauntlets are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

21010015.desc: Gaze upon this Broadblade, its sharp edges gleaming in the frigid air. Wield it to feel power coursing through you like a raging river.

21050016.desc: The puppet's palm unfurls, releasing deadly strings with a menacing hum. The air crackles, immobilizing foes and leaving unhealable scars from rapid electric bolts.

21010063.desc: Forged from the scale of Jué, this weapon resembles a musical instrument more than a tool of destruction.

21050043.desc: The Rectifier provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, is very popular among the explorers.

21020013.desc: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this sword also represents the ambition of those brave souls.

21030024.desc: An ascending crescendo. These pistols unleash bullets with the force of thunder, tearing through the heavens like a symphony of destruction.

21020064.desc: The Sword born from the aerial phenomenon. The forger integrates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look light and sharp, but it can exert the energy of breaking the sky and cutting iron like mud.

21030034.desc: The Huaxu Academy has developed practical, high-performance pistols based on previous source energy weapons, showcasing their meticulous research and aiming for excellence.

21020015.desc: Pay heed: the frigid blade reveals an icy current, amalgamating into a whirlpool of thoughts. Use this powerful sequence to effortlessly crush your enemies with the Sword.
